prompts: Create a dual-type Pokemon that can burrow underground and has sharp claws.
I want a Pokemon that has a sleek design, combining steel and ground elements.
Generate a creature that resembles a drill with metallic features and a tough exterior.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in caves and can quickly dig through earth and rock.
Imagine a Pokemon that is both fierce and agile, with a dark color palette and spiky features.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of excavation and has a bold presence.
Give me a Pokemon that has a mix of dark and steel tones, showcasing its powerful digging abilities.
